title: If-Unmodified-Since
summary:
The HyperText Transfer Protocol (HTTP) If-Unmodified-Since request header makes the
  request for the resource conditional: the server will send the requested resource or accept it in
  the case of a POST or another non-safe method only if the resource has not been modified after the date specified by this HTTP header. If the resource has been modified
  after the specified date, the response will be a 412 Precondition Failed error.
